greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle of coefficients of certain polynomials (exponents in decreasing order).
formula: a(n, n)= 1, a(n, m)= (1+n^2)*binomial(n, m)*n^(n-m-2), n>m >= 0, else 0.
xref: x*p(k-1, -x)/q(k, -x), with the row polynomials p(n, x) from triangle A033842(n, m) is for k=1..5 G.f. for A000079 (powers of two), A039717, A043553, A045624, A046088, respectively.
results.author: _Wolfdieter Lang_
